arts.ttl: Blackburn Rovers could get a first glimpse of in-house Hyam replacement vs Watford amid worrying shortage: Opinion
arts.sum: Blackburn Rovers lack centre-backs, and amid this shortage, the focus could turn to Lewis Miller and his ability to tuck into a central role.
